org.apache.james.mailbox.store.mail

Interface MessageMapper<Id>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Mapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessageMapper, HBaseMessageMapper, InMemoryMessageMapper, JCRMessageMapper, JPAMessageMapper, MaildirMessageMapper

    public interface MessageMapper<Id>
extends Mapper
    Maps Message in a MessageManager. A MessageMapper has a lifecycle from the start of a request to the end of the request.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MessageMapper.FetchType
      Specify what data needs to get filled in a Message before returning it

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.james.mailbox.store.transaction.Mapper

        Mapper.Transaction<T>, Mapper.VoidTransaction

    • Method Detail

      • findInMailbox

        Iterator<Message<Id>> findInMailbox(Mailbox<Id> mailbox,
                                  MessageRange set,
                                  MessageMapper.FetchType type,
                                  int limit)
                                    throws MailboxException
        Return a Iterator which holds the messages for the given criterias The list must be ordered by the Message uid
        Parameters:
        mailbox - The mailbox to search
        set - message range for batch processing
        type -
        limit - the maximal limit of returned Message's. Use -1 to set no limit. In any case the caller MUST not expect the limit to get applied in all cases as the implementation MAY just ignore it
        Throws:
        MailboxException

      • expungeMarkedForDeletionInMailbox

        Map<Long,MessageMetaData> expungeMarkedForDeletionInMailbox(Mailbox<Id> mailbox,
                                                          MessageRange set)
                                                            throws MailboxException
        Return a Iterator which holds the uids for all deleted Messages for the given MessageRange which are marked for deletion The list must be ordered
        Parameters:
        mailbox -
        set -
        Returns:
        uids
        Throws:
        MailboxException

      • findFirstUnseenMessageUid

        Long findFirstUnseenMessageUid(Mailbox<Id> mailbox)
                               throws MailboxException
        Return the uid of the first unseen message. If non can be found null will get returned
        Parameters:
        mailbox -
        Returns:
        uid or null
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • findRecentMessageUidsInMailbox

        List<Long> findRecentMessageUidsInMailbox(Mailbox<Id> mailbox)
                                          throws MailboxException
        Return a List of Message which are recent. The list must be ordered by the Message uid.
        Parameters:
        mailbox -
        Returns:
        recentList
        Throws:
        StorageException
        MailboxException

      • add

        MessageMetaData add(Mailbox<Id> mailbox,
                  Message<Id> message)
                    throws MailboxException
        Add the given Message to the underlying storage. Be aware that implementation may choose to replace the uid of the given message while storing. So you should only depend on the returned uid.
        Parameters:
        mailbox -
        message -
        Returns:
        uid
        Throws:
        StorageException
        MailboxException

      • updateFlags

        Iterator<UpdatedFlags> updateFlags(Mailbox<Id> mailbox,
                                 javax.mail.Flags flags,
                                 boolean value,
                                 boolean replace,
                                 MessageRange set)
                                   throws MailboxException
        Update flags for the given MessageRange. Only the flags may be modified after a message was saved to a mailbox.
        Parameters:
        mailbox -
        flags -
        value -
        replace -
        set -
        Returns:
        updatedFlags
        Throws:
        MailboxException

      • copy

        MessageMetaData copy(Mailbox<Id> mailbox,
                   Message<Id> original)
                     throws MailboxException
        Copy the given Message to a new mailbox and return the uid of the copy. Be aware that the given uid is just a suggestion for the uid of the copied message. Implementation may choose to use a different one, so only depend on the returned uid!
        Parameters:
        mailbox - the Mailbox to copy to
        original - the original to copy
        Throws:
        StorageException
        MailboxException

      • getLastUid

                throws MailboxException
        Return the last uid which were used for storing a Message in the Mailbox
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        lastUid
        Throws:
